channel.title: ~how do i PORT FORWARD~-The number 1 killer question
channel.description: So, i have got my source, everything, i run my server, open up moparscape, and yay! im in.. 5 seconds later..im lonely! how do i get people on my server? ive downloaded no-ip, and i have a no-iprunning (leaderscape.no-ip.biz)

item.title: ~how do i PORT FORWARD~-The number 1 killer question
item.dc:creator: @Joshinator Joshinator
item.description:
@Joshinator wrote:

It says that its offline because i havnt port forwarded![br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 17, 2008, 03:00:11 PM[/size][hr]this is exactly what im doing.

Read full topic

item.title: ~how do i PORT FORWARD~-The number 1 killer question
item.dc:creator: @Vanack Vanack
item.description:
@Vanack wrote:

First of all, you don’t DOWNLOAD no-ip. You register it.

And to the point, find a tutorial in that section.

For Portforwarding, use www.portforward.com

Read full topic
